TopicTitle: [ShowCase] One of the best MANUAL Landing "Tutorial air-craft".

Articles.Content:
Land on Kerbin (from Kerbin to Kerbin). Almost 99% success rate.

This craft is "Ideal" for learning how to land "MANUALLY". It can fly very slow, and still floating. Touch down made very gentle and easy.

The Principe of landing:

1) Slow in speed (100m/s to 50m/s) (don't off your engine, put it to 5~10%, so the yellow mark can go up.)

2) Horizontal touch down. (Check image below. The "yellow-mark", should be just a little down to the brown ground line. 5%~10%)

I use the HyperEdit to put the craft 100,000m above Mun and make a landing fuel usage test. (take a couple of try though)

Javascript is disabled. View full album

.Craft file made available base on PM request.

Proof of landing. The craft will retire at the shelter for now.

Note: The "reverse", I have no ideal why it happened, It just did...like you put a craft at the runway, It just roll slowly.
